Class CsvApplicationRepository

java.lang.Object
CsvApplicationRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicationRepository
public class CsvApplicationRepository extends Object implements IApplicationRepository
CSV-based repository implementation for managing applications. Loads and saves application data to/from a CSV file.
